statements.update: INSERT INTO `RBAC_Button` ( `Id`, `Name`, `Title`, `Image`, `Code`, `Sort`, `Category`, `Remark`, `Status`, `CreateUserId`, `CreateDateTime` ) VALUES ( uuid(), #Name#, #Title#, #Image#, #Code#, #Sort#, #Category#, #Remark#, 1, #CreateUserId#, now() ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE UPDATE `RBAC_Button` SET `Name`=#Name#, `Title`=#Title#, `Image`=#Image#, `Code`=#Code#, `Sort`=#Sort#, `Category`=#Category#, `Remark`=#Remark#, `ModifyUserId`=#ModifyUserId#, `ModifyDateTime`=now()
statements.select: SELECT 1 FROM `RBAC_SystemMenu` WHERE `Name` IN (SELECT `Name` FROM `RBAC_Button` WHERE `Id`=#value#) AND `Category`=3 LIMIT 1

SELECT a.`Id` ,a.`Name` ,a.`Title` ,a.`Image` ,a.`Code` ,a.`Sort` ,a.`Category` ,a.`Remark` ,a.``CreateUserId` ,u1.`Name` AS CreateUserName ,a.`CreateDateTime` ,a.`ModifyUserId` ,u2.`Name` AS ModifyUserName ,a.`ModifyDateTime` FROM `RBAC_Button` a LEFT JOIN `RBAC_User` u1 ON a.`CreateUserId`=u1.`Id` LEFT JOIN `RBAC_User` u2 ON a.`ModifyUserId`=u2.`Id` WHERE a.`Id`=#value#

SELECT a.`Id` ,a.`Name` ,a.`Title` ,a.`Image` ,a.`Code` ,a.`Sort` ,a.`Category` ,a.`Remark` ,a.`CreateUserId` ,u1.`Name` AS CreateUserName ,a.`CreateDateTime` ,a.`ModifyUserId` ,u2.`Name` AS ModifyUserName ,a.`ModifyDateTime` FROM `RBAC_BUTTON` a LEFT JOIN `RBAC_User` u1 ON a.`CreateUserId`=u1.`Id` LEFT JOIN `RBAC_User` u2 ON a.`ModifyUserId`=u2.`Id` WHERE a.`Status`=1 ORDER BY `Sort` ASC

SELECT CASE WHEN cte.`Id` IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS IsAllotToSystemMenu, a.* FROM( SELECT b.`Id`, a.`Sort` FROM `rbac_SystemMenu` a INNER JOIN `RBAC_Button` b ON a.`Name`=b.`Name` WHERE `ParentId`=#value# AND a.`Category`=3 ) cte RIGHT JOIN `RBAC_Button` a ON a.`Id` = cte.`Id` ORDER BY CASE WHEN cte.`Id` IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END DESC, cte.`Sort` ASC, a.`Sort` ASC
